headline: Lennox Wins Multiple HVAC All-Star Awards from ACHR News
summary: Air Conditioning, Heating, & Refrigeration (ACHR) News has announced that Lennox Commercial HVAC Xion™ Rooftop Units and the Lennox ON AIR podcast each received HVAC All-Star Awards in the Commercial Products and Podcaster/Influencer categories, respectively. The Armstrong Air® & AirEase® Pro Series™ All Climate Heat Pump from Allied Air Enterprises also earned honorable mention in the Residential Products category. Introduced in 2025 to replace the Dealer Design Awards, the HVAC All-Star Awards

content.summary: Air Conditioning, Heating, & Refrigeration (ACHR) News has announced that Lennox Commercial HVAC Xion™ Rooftop Units and the Lennox ON AIR podcast each received HVAC All-Star Awards in the Commercial Products and Podcaster/Influencer categories, respectively. The Armstrong Air® & AirEase® Pro Series™ All Climate Heat Pump from Allied Air Enterprises also earned honorable mention in the Residential Products category. Introduced in 2025 to replace the Dealer Design Awards, the HVAC All-Star Awards

thumbnail.caption: The Lennox ON AIR podcast won an HVAC All-Star Award from ACHR News in the Podcast/Influencer category.
